about_the_game:
Play as John F. Spellgroove, a dumb college dropout chasing his dreams to compete in The Arena, a massive yet mysterious corporation pitting the sickest spellcasters, fighters, and dancers against one another. With the help of your discount grimoire Booker, step into The Arena and boogie your way to the top while uncovering the bogus secrets hidden within. Chit-chat with fellow combatants and learn what makes them tick, cast a variety of wicked spells that shuffle in and out every 30 seconds via Booker's "generosity", consume insane amounts of booze, and jiggy your way through hordes of stylish foes to become The Champion and expose The Arena's BS!






Content listed below applicable to the full version of Spellgroove only.]

‣ Boogie through over 15 matches, pitting you against several unique enemy types

‣ Uncover the mystery behind The Arena, learning more on the road to becoming Champion

‣ Discover and upgrade over 30 unique spells from across 6 different elements: Fire, Ice, Lightning, Poison, Neon, and Chaos

‣ Encounter a colorful cast of combatants, each with fun banter and backstories to tell

‣ Order over 20 unique "cocktails", martinis, and hard "liquor" to temporarily improve your stats

‣ Create your own custom matches via the Scenario Editor to test your skills

‣ Pit your live chat against you with the Streaming Mode, letting them spawn enemies and debuffs


Happy chugging!
